resources.string: BLE service for communication with Arduino
This button will enable the distance sensor. %1$s
This button will turn on the lights on the stick. %1$s
This button will turn on the beeping feedback from the sensor. %1$s
This button will take you to an information screen.
Information about the different functions of this application.

The proximity sensor will detect objects appearing in front of the sensor attached to the staff. The sensor will give feedback in the shape of sound and vibration something is detected. Turn the sensor off and on with the button in the top left corner of the main screen.

The light emitting diodes attached to the staff can be turned off and on which will make it visible in the dark. Turn this function off and on with the button in the top right corner of the main screen.

A beeping sound can be emitted from the phone, indicating when the proximity sensor is detecting an object. The interval between beeps will be shorter as the distance to the object decreases. Turn this function off and on with the button in the bottom right corner of the main screen.
You didn\'t give permission to access device location.
It is dark outside. You might want to switch on the lights.
It is bright outside. You might want to switch off the lights.
